English.Text: The diplomat is the nicest consumer the administration officer has seen in a while. The old man holds up the group, rambling about his life for long minutes, visibly happy to have somebody to listen. Eventually, he stamps the official paper and wishes the bush a nice day. The crew leaves happy, they can be among the happy few who have a great experience with administration.</br></br>Diplomat beat them at their own game, understanding the administration system.
